org.apache.polygene.api.serialization

Interface Serializer

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    JavaxJsonSerialization, JavaxXmlSerialization, JsonSerialization, JsonSerializer, MessagePackSerialization, MessagePackSerializer, Serialization, XmlSerialization, XmlSerializer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBinarySerializer, AbstractSerializer, AbstractTextSerializer, JavaxJsonSerializer, JavaxXmlSerializer, MessagePackSerializer.Mixin

    public interface Serializer
    Serializer. All implementations must handle all Serializer.Options, they might extend them to provide more control. See their respective documentation for the details.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Serializer.Options
      State serializer options.
